subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Important News
msgSnippet: We over at the Shavian group have just started receiving similar spam to this. It looks like the start of a barrage. Once one spammer gets hold of the address
messageBody:
We over at the Shavian group have just started receiving similar spam to
this. It looks like the start of a barrage. Once one spammer gets hold of
the address like this and keeps spamming regularly, the address will most
likely be passed on and find itself in the hands of yet more spammers.

Unfortunately in our case we have no moderator so we can't even ban the
addresses.

Hugh B

----- Original Message -----
From: <cathleen_vmo@...>
To: <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 2004 4:47 PM
Subject: [Read_Alphabet] Important News


> Hello, fellow Read_Alphabet member.
> This company really helped me out.
> I almost lost my home.
> I am self employed and I was able to refinance.
> The best interest rates are available, for a limited time
> Don't miss out stop in today.
> http://sup3rmon3ysav3r.4ever.cc
> This email was sent because you joined our group.
> If you do not wish to recieve any emails, unsubscribe.
> by sending a mail here Read_Alphabet-unsubscribe@yahoogroups.com
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
